title: Project Launch and Vision
content:
Welcome to the official blog of Medieval Tower! We are thrilled to finally launch this project that we are so passionate about. Our vision is to create an immersive RPG experience where every choice matters.

Stay tuned for more updates on development, new features, and exclusive content!

title: First Gameplay Mechanics
content:
This week, we've made significant progress on the core gameplay mechanics. The infinite tower system is taking shape, and we're starting to implement the first management features for your base.

We are focusing on a rewarding gameplay loop that combines exploration, combat, and strategy.
